Here, in a very safe space, you can meet colleagues who may be dealing with similar situations to share your experiences, stories, emotions and draw strength from each other.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All group meetings are moderated by an EPAM coach who facilitates discussions, topics, and the overall process. This format is not the classic therapy, but a resource group field to get emotional support at any level of engagement  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you’re feeling struggled alone, join us and we’ll help you to find inner resources to rebuild your life. \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
